sentences.en: At last the light dawned. He was going to marry Phylis!
sentences.cn: 终于明白过来了——他要和菲莉丝结婚了！

sentences.en: Between ourselves, I know he wants to marry her.
sentences.cn: 我们私下说说，我知道他想娶她。

sentences.en: He asked me to marry him and I accepted.
sentences.cn: 他向我求婚，我答应了。

sentences.en: He did not think he would marry Beth.
sentences.cn: 他觉得他是不会和贝丝结婚的。

sentences.en: He married Bea in 1925.
sentences.cn: 他在1925年娶了贝亚。

sentences.en: He promised his mother on her deathbed that he would never marry.
sentences.cn: 他向垂危的母亲保证他绝不结婚。

sentences.en: He wants to marry her.
sentences.cn: 他想娶她为妻。

sentences.en: I am absolutely furious that he divorced me to marry her.
sentences.cn: 他为了娶她而和我离婚，我愤怒至极。

sentences.en: I was under the delusion that he intended to marry me.
sentences.cn: 我误认为他要娶我。

sentences.en: I will return, find you, love you, marry you and live without shame.
sentences.cn: 我会回去，找到你，爱你，娶你，活的光明正大。《赎罪》

sentences.en: I would dearly love to marry.
sentences.cn: 我很想结婚。

sentences.en: I’m going to ask her to marry me on St Valentine’s Day.
sentences.cn: 我打算在情人节向她求婚。

sentences.en: In Scotland, young people can marry at 16.
sentences.cn: 在苏格兰，年轻人16岁就可以结婚。

sentences.en: People in higher social classes are more likely to marry late (= when they are older than is usual ) .
sentences.cn: 社会阶层较高的人士倾向于晚婚。

sentences.en: She married young (= at a young age ) .
sentences.cn: 她结婚早。

sentences.en: She ought to marry again, don't you think?
sentences.cn: 她应该再婚，难道你不这么认为吗？

sentences.en: Sophia had, in a sense, married beneath her (= married someone of a lower social class than her ) .
sentences.cn: 索菲娅在某种意义上是下嫁了。

sentences.en: The majority of British women adopt their husband's surname when they marry.
sentences.cn: 大多数英国女性结婚后随夫姓。

sentences.en: They'll forbid you to marry.
sentences.cn: 他们不会准许你结婚。

sentences.en: What on earth had possessed her to agree to marry him?
sentences.cn: 究竟是什么让她同意嫁给他的？

words.tran_cn: 已婚的，有配偶的；婚姻的，夫妇的；密切结合的
结婚；婚姻生活；密切结合，合并

phrases.phrase: marry in haste, repent at leisure

trans.tran_cn: 结婚，为…主持婚礼，把…嫁给，为…娶亲，相结合
trans.tran_en: if you marry someone, you become their husband or wife
if you marry someone, you become their husband or wife

trans.tran_cn: 同…结婚，娶，嫁；为…证婚，为…主持婚礼；把…嫁出，为…娶亲
trans.tran_en: if you marry someone, you become their husband or wife
